messages.title: Protecting Our Local Quality of Life in Putney
messages.content: Justine is working hard to protect our local environment from extra aircraft noise, and tackle air pollution on Putney High Street. She is making the case for the continued investment we need for better local District Line, train and bus services.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Establish Britain as the strongest country in Europe
Build a stronger economy that rewards people who work hard and creates secure and well-paid jobs
keyPolicies.policyDescription: more security and prosperity around the whole country
building affordable housing and ensuring there is a good school place for every child

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Build a more secure and united nation
keyPolicies.policyDescription: taking decisions and working up to the aspirations that we set out for the people.

issues.brexitEurope: If we don't have an election now, we risk losing our chance to make a success of Brexit.

issues.transport: Justine is working for better investment in our local District Line, train and bus services.

community.content: Standing up for Southfields - Justine is campaigning with Southfields residents and the Southfields Business Forum to prevent Wimbledon Park Road shopping parade from losing its shops and businesses.

politicalExperience.role: Vice Chair of Southfields Business Forum
politicalExperience.achievements: prevent Wimbledon Park Road shopping parade from losing its shops and businesses.

endorsements.endorsement: Only Theresa May has the plan and the proven leadership to deliver the best deal for Britain and succeed in a way that ordinary, working people need.

quotes.text: Every vote cast for Theresa May and the Conservatives will strengthen Britain's hand in the Brexit negotiations.

images.caption: Justine discusses air pollution measures with local shoppers on Putney High Street, London's first Low Emission Bus Zone.
Justine is the Vice Chair of Southfields Business Forum.
